perturbation.changed_text: (n) "Territory" shall mean regions determined at the Licensee's discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'Territory' clearly specifies 'mainland China.' The modified definition introduces ambiguity, contradicting the initial intent. This change makes the geographical scope uncertain.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law Principles - Clarity and Definiteness

perturbation.original_text: (q) "VOD" shall mean a system that allows for the exhibition of video programming chosen by a subscriber for display on that subscriber's video display unit on an on-demand basis, such that a subscriber is able, at his or her discretion, to select the time for commencement of exhibition, and shall include subscription VOD ("SVOD"), transactional VOD ("TVOD"), ad-supported VOD ("AVOD") and free VOD.
perturbation.changed_text: (q) "VOD" shall mean any video content delivery system, including linear streaming services, as designated by the Licensee.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'VOD' specifies on-demand selection by the subscriber. The modified definition expands it to include linear streaming, which is not on-demand and contradicts the typical understanding of VOD. This alters the fundamental nature of the licensed content distribution method.

perturbation.original_text: Licensor will use its partners and media channels to expand distribution of Licensee's VOD services to more cable MSOs and all other platforms for which Licensee is permitted to distribute the Titles under Section 2(a)(i) [License Grant].
perturbation.changed_text: Licensor may, at its convenience, suggest channels for expanding Licensee's distribution; however, Licensor has no obligation to do so.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the Licensor 'will use' its channels to expand distribution. The modified text changes this to a mere suggestion with no obligation. This significantly weakens the Licensor's commitment and the Licensee's benefit, creating conflict around the original distribution expansion intent.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law Principles - Obligation of Good Faith
